p:
A total of 1804 PR/RT sequences were obtained from newly HIV diagnosed people at six different hospitals and two HIV counselling and testing centres (CIPS) from the three provinces in the CV between 2004 and 2014. The sequences comprised the complete PR and the first 1005 nucleotides (335 amino acids) of the RT (1302 nt in total), and were obtained and subtyped as detailed in Pati√±o-Galindo et al.
25 .
